field.comment: When did we last push our data to the remote?
field.name: pushed

field.comment: When did we get the last version of the remote system? After we push we (should) also know the pulled.
field.name: pulled

field.comment: The last content we pushed (if any).
field.name: content

field.comment: You can decouple a particular subscription. For instance if we notice that a system deleted an entry, we don't want to keep pushing it.
field.name: decoupled

field.comment: Sometimes we update the content based on the last successfull push, assuming it is up to date. A pull might reveal a discrepancy
field.name: assumedContent
